pkg.name: link-list
pkg.title: Link list
pkg.description: Link list is a simple set of vertical or horizontal links used for site navigation and to order information for users.

scope.title: Link list
scope.description: Link list is a simple set of vertical or horizontal links used for site navigation and to order information for users.

relatedComponents.name: inpage-nav
relatedComponents.title: Inpage nav
relatedComponents.description: Also known as Page contents, Inpage nav links help users scan page contents and quickly navigate to different sections.

relatedComponents.name: list
relatedComponents.title: List
relatedComponents.description: Lists are vertical groupings of related items that can be displayed either in an unordered or ordered format.

relatedComponents.name: side-nav
relatedComponents.title: Side nav
relatedComponents.description: A vertical list of links use for site navigation, typically placed next to body content.

relatedComponents.name: sub-nav
relatedComponents.title: Sub nav
relatedComponents.description: A horizontal list of links typically placed between the main navigation and page content.
